content.en: Battery optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize the design and performance of lithium-ion battery thermal management systems. These algorithms, such as Multi-objective Genetic Algorithm and Stud Genetic Algorithm, are being employed to find the best configurations and structures for these systems. By using computational methods and artificial intelligence, scientists are able to improve the efficiency and thermal performance of battery systems, which is crucial for electric vehicles and other applications.
content.da: Batterioptimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere design og ydeevne af termiske styringssystemer for lithium-ion-batterier. Disse algoritmer, såsom Multi-objective Genetic Algorithm og Stud Genetic Algorithm, anvendes til at finde de bedste konfigurationer og strukturer for disse systemer. Ved hjælp af computational metode og kunstig intelligens kan videnskabsmænd forbedre effektiviteten og den termiske ydeevne af batterisystemer, hvilket er afgørende for elektriske køretøjer og andre anvendelser.
